issue.title: [Rust] Add Parquet/Arrow schema converter
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4060](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4060). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should support conversion from Parquet to Arrow schema.

comments.body:
